name: Humberto ALICEA, Petitioner v. Judge Paul YATRON, Berks County CCP, Respondent

parties: Humberto ALICEA, Petitioner v. Judge Paul YATRON, Berks County CCP, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 13th day of October, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED, and the Prothonotary is DIRECTED to strike the jurist’s name from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
123 A.3d 1060
Humberto ALICEA, Petitioner v. Judge Paul YATRON, Berks County CCP, Respondent.
No. 125 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 13, 2015.
